solution_line_template: Beatrice looked at {online_multiplier} x {num_tvs_in_person} TVs at an online store = <<{online_multiplier}*{num_tvs_in_person}={num_tvs_online}>>{num_tvs_online} TVs.
She looked at {num_tvs_in_person} TVs in person + {num_tvs_online} TVs online = <<{num_tvs_in_person}+{num_tvs_online}={num_tvs_first_two}>>{num_tvs_first_two} TVs.
Beatrice looked at {total_tvs} TVs in all - the {num_tvs_first_two} she looked at = <<{total_tvs}-{num_tvs_first_two}={num_tvs_auction}>>{num_tvs_auction} TVs she looked at on an auction site.
